siteMetadata.name: Clay Tsay
siteMetadata.title: Clay Tsay | Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: A software engineer with training in both computer science and chemical engineering.
siteMetadata.about: I am interested in the application of computer science to solving problems in more traditional engineering fields, namely chemical engineering. My college studies focused on machine learning, artificial intelligence, and computational methods in chemical engineering. My current work focuses on writing backend code for Alexa Music's cloud services.
